item.title: Building a Simple Port Scanner with GO
item.description: Building a Simple Port-Scanner with Go These days i wanted to make a new project with go, so i went to the programming challenges page and searched for something, the port scanner caught my attention, so i decided to went for it. Disclaimer What we’re gonna use build can’t be used against servers which you don’t have a permission to run. Read this to understand more
